snippet.title: Escape Tales: The Awakening - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Escape Tales: The Awakening is a digital adaptation of the bestselling escape room card game by LockMe and Board&Dice. The game is now available on Steam!

In Escape Tales: The Awakening, you play as Sam, a man whose wife passed away a few years ago and whose daughter has unexpectedly fallen into a coma for unknown reasons. With doctors insisting there’s no explanation for her illness and a mysterious man giving Sam "The Book of Rituals" - a book that claims to have the power to wake his daughter - Sam must stay sane while facing forces beyond his understanding.

Along with immersing players in a dark, mysterious world, Escape Tales: The Awakening delivers a gripping narrative about loss, redemption, and the ghosts of the past. The game offers open exploration, multiple endings, challenging puzzles, and an engaging story. Your moral decisions will be tested, and your problem-solving skills pushed to the limit. With no time restrictions, you can take as long as you need to navigate its twists and turns.

The full version is available on Steam - check it out now!
